reviewText: great shape
I bought this for Primal Fear, which has an interesting and unexpected ending. Have actually not watched the other 2 movies included, but have always been a Gere fan.
Three great/classic movies!!!! These will be movies for generations. My daughters loves them too!
Love this triple play
A couple old favorites that my kids wanted to see.  Hard to find movies in the post blockbuster era.

Star of this movie is edward norton. Brilliant acting. Surprise ending. enjoyed this movie. I would recommend especially if your interested in good courtroom dramas. I liked Richard Gere in both Primal Fear and Officer and a gentleman. Ironically Lou Gossett jr won for best supporting actor for Officer and a Gentleman. The award should have gone to Norton who at least was nominated.for Primal Fear. This collection was a good deal. 3 movies for a very reasonable price. Richard Gere along with the reliable Julia Roberts in The Runaway Bride. Although my favorite with these actors together is Pretty Woman. But thats for another review. Buy this collection. You won't be disappointed. Especially for the price.

I have shopped online enough to become, sometimes, overcome by the frustration involved with someone selling me bad product. After all this I cant tell you how much I appreciate someone that delivers quality for a good price...it saves me all the pain and headache as well.

I was looking forward to watching officer and a gentleman and not only was my package late but its the wrong movie. they gave me a triple feature with different movie titles and i don't even know how i would even get this fixed because the company had no number on the invoice. i would of given this a five star if i at least got the right movie!
Just for a library of movies I have seen before. I really only wanted Primal Fear and couldn't find it anywere else.

I enjoy Richard Gere in just about everything I've seen him in, and appreciate getting a 3-in-1 for about the cost of one.  You have a little of everything in this package - serious love and passion in An Officer & a  Gentleman; fun love and whimsy in The Runaway Bride; and go-get-'em activity in Primal Fear.  Good job!
Loved the movie An Officer and a Gentleman.  I could watch it over and over again.
really good
Very pleased with purchase
great price
Great movies by Richard Gere.
Just what I wanted and it arrived on-time!
what can you say its gere
I love these movies and the fact that I got such a good deal on these three featured movies was very impressive.
It was a good time to remind about how well we enjoyed the movies years ago.
AWESOME
